description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Heavy Payload is an aerial shoot 'em up set over the European Theater of World War II.  The player must use machine guns to defend their bomber from enemy planes en route to the mission target.  The game has two distinct modes: Arcade (classic game play) and Advanced (a new twist to the original game).  Each mode has 18 missions with 4 levels of difficulty.
